it.polimi.se2018.alternative_network.newserver

Class RemotePlayer2

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.alternative_network.newserver.RemotePlayer2
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RMIPlayer, SocketPlayer

    public abstract class RemotePlayer2
extends java.lang.Object
    Generic abstract class for send and receive messages

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RemotePlayer2()
      constructor that set by default the player as running

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GameInterface getGameInterface()
      when the remote player is associated with a game return the reference to the interface that allows to send messages directly to the game room and to notify a disconnection.
      int getIdPlayerInGame()
      method for get the id of the remote player in the game room
      java.lang.String getNickname()
      method for get the name of the remote player
      boolean isPlayerRunning()
      method for get if the remote player is still reachable by the server or game room
      abstract void kickPlayerOut()
      method that need to implement the remove from the client gatherer or any type of class that the player use to send the View.
      abstract void sayHelloClient()
      this method is used when the game room needs to know if the player is still connected
      void sendEventToController(EventController eventController)
      method of the Rmi player for send the event directly to the game room without passing thought the main server that hold all the game room
      abstract void sendEventToView(EventView eventView)
      this method is used when the game room needs to send some EventView to the client related to this remote player
      void setGameInterface(GameInterface gameInterface)
      method to associate the remote player with the game room
      void setIdPlayerInGame(int idPlayerInGame)
      method for set the id of the remote player in the game room
      void setNickname(java.lang.String nickname)
      method for set the name of the player, typically is received when he ask to make the login
      void setPlayerRunning(boolean playerRunning)
      method for set if the remote player is still connected without trying to contact him

        public void setPlayerRunning(boolean playerRunning)
        method for set if the remote player is still connected without trying to contact him
        Parameters:

      • getGameInterface

        public GameInterface getGameInterface()
        when the remote player is associated with a game return the reference to the interface that allows to send messages directly to the game room and to notify a disconnection.
        Returns:
        the GameInterface associated to this player

      • sendEventToView

        public abstract void sendEventToView(EventView eventView)
                              throws ConnectionPlayerException
        this method is used when the game room needs to send some EventView to the client related to this remote player
        Parameters:
        eventView - event that the client needs
        Throws:
        ConnectionPlayerException - is thrown if the player didn't respond

      • sayHelloClient

        public abstract void sayHelloClient()
                             throws ConnectionPlayerException
        this method is used when the game room needs to know if the player is still connected
        Throws:
        ConnectionPlayerException - is thrown if the player didn't respond

      • kickPlayerOut

        public abstract void kickPlayerOut()
        method that need to implement the remove from the client gatherer or any type of class that the player use to send the View. doing so the game Room can kick out from the server the client.

      • sendEventToController

        public void sendEventToController(EventController eventController)
        method of the Rmi player for send the event directly to the game room without passing thought the main server that hold all the game room
        Parameters:
        eventController - event requested by the client
